text: Letestua is a genus of plant in family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1917.Tropicos, Letestua Lecomte Chevalier, Auguste Jean Baptiste. 1917. Les végétaux Utiles de l'Afrique Tropical Française 9: 257Lecomte, Paul Henri. 1920. Notulae Systematicae. Herbier du Museum de Paris 4: 3-7 descriptions in Latin, commentary in French, line drawings as illustrations There is only one recognized species, Letestua durissima. It is native to Gabon and West Congo.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==References== Category:Sapotaceae Category:Flora of Africa Category:Monotypic Ericales genera
title: Letestua
